validation.validation: This meeting pattern and location combination overlaps with that for another course section or activity. Enter a different location or a meeting pattern that doesn't overlap with other meeting patterns.
Must select the Schedulable Activity Behavior to submit Schedulable Data.
Must select the Billable Activity Behavior to submit Billable Data.
Must select the Enrollable Activity Behavior to submit Enrollable Data.
To submit an Eligibility Rule, you must submit a new Activity and select "Enrollable & Eligible" on the Activity Behavior.
